title: Countries and automakers agree to go all-electric by 2040 in weak new goal set at COP26
content:
1. Countries and automakers agree to go all-electric by 2040 in weak new goal set at COP26  Electrek
  2. 6 Automakers and 30 Countries Say They’ll Phase Out Gasoline Car Sales  The New York Times
  3. The Full List Of Car Companies Signed On To Bring Emissions To Zero Is Pretty Short  Jalopnik
  4. Please Stop. I'm Tired of Hearing About Big Climate Goals  Bloomberg
  5. Efforts to cut car, plane and ship emissions get small boost  Associated Press
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 2040年までに電気自動車を普及させることで各国と自動車メーカーが合意、COP26で新たな目標が設定される
各国和汽车制造商同意在2040年前实现全电动化，这是在缔约方大会第二十六届会议上制定的薄弱的新目标
各國和汽車製造商同意在2040年前實現全電動化，這是在締約方大會第二十六屆會議上制定的薄弱的新目標
